data.title: LP Development Reviews
data.meta_description: Do you agree with LP Development's 4-star rating? Check out what 7 people have written so far, and share your own experience.
data.text:
Our Profile

We change the world as we know it, we think out of the box!

Our History

We are different people with different background with a lot of international project experience.

LP Development operates in three different main business areas: IT Services, Marketing and Constructions & Renovations.

Despite the fact that these fields look different, they are joined harmoniously and give us the power to offer to our clients unique services, something that other companies cannot easily do so.

We started in the early 1996 mainly providing IT services (websites and custom software in Perl, CGI and later in PHP) & Marketing services (mainly printed advertising). In 2002 we started our timid steps in the field of shop renovations and we started to provide to our customers unique services for their new business. In a few years we could offer them full renovation of their business and at the same time competitive marketing, advertising and IT solutions. With our experience we could help them properly to set up or design their products and guide them to reach their goals.

On the other hand, due to our structure and the existing partnerships, we have been able to provide additional construction and promotional services by designing and constructing unique exhibition stands for our customers. In 2006, along with the above, we have fully entered into the field of constructions, technical projects and GIS projects. Besides renovation services we are also involved in undertaking technical studies for public and private sectors. At the same time we never stop providing our unique IT services.

In 2009 we undertook some difficult e-learning projects that gave us extra experience in the field of on-line educational services.

Our experience upon all these different business fields gave us the ability to see things differently, to do things out of the box and to have innovative ideas in different fields.

Support our project that will help all children of the world.

We expect your support!

Read more at our projectâ€™s website.
